data.message: There are others on the Mountain but with Tupac in Heaven, you are the only one on Top of the Mountain sitting as King. No one goes as deep as you two from  the mind. Guts and Fear, one of my favorites, is pure genius  :) What really sets you apart, you are a true example of what is called "Daddy". I had a great one. In the midst of "today", it is awesome to see a man in your position set an example for all young men by just being you. May God bless you always.
